translation: Neither does the Lord create agency nor actions for the world, nor union with the fruits of actions; rather, it is Nature that acts.
commentary: 5.14 Not not? doership agency? Not not? Karmani actions? of the world for this world? creates creates? Lord: the Lord? Not not? karmaphalasamyogam union with the fruits of actions? Nature: nature? You but? pravartate leads to action.Commentary The Lord does not create agency or doership. He doesnâ€™t pressure anyone into taking actions. He never tells anyone? Do this or do that. He does not bring about the union with the fruit of actions. It is Prakritit or Nature that does everything. (Cf.III.33)
